c74object.name: rtt.feel~

method.name: in2
method.description: A list of floating-point numbers, typically between -1 and 1, is the function that will modulate the incoming phasor's ramp. The amount of modulation is controlled by depth

attribute.name: depth
attribute.digest: Amount of modulation to apply to the input phasor.

attribute.name: syncupdate
attribute.digest: When enabled, changes to parameters are deferred until the input phasor wraps.

c74object.description: rtt.feel~ accepts a phasor-style ramp to its first inlet and a list of floating-point numbers to its right inlet. The list modulates the slope of the ramp to achieve timing that is loose, irregular, and non-robotic.
c74object.digest: Modulate a phasor ramp for loose timing.
